issue.title: [Rust] Document patch release process
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11934](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11934). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that we moved to voting on source releases for patch releases, we need to document the process for doing so in the Rust implementation.

 

Google doc for discussion / collaboration: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1i2Elk6J0H4nhPeQZdLDyqvHoRbsabx2iOTXLHxxNqRE/edit?usp=sharing
